tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to remote code execution (RCE) due to insufficient validation of user input, allowing attackers to invoke dangerous functions such as `popen`.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version which is within vulnerability ranges and if you are using the `NativeJob` class.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `craftcms/cms` library to the patch version.
